      • isPossibleX

        private boolean isPossibleX(int[][] game,
                  int y,
                  int number)
        Returns whether given number is candidate on x axis for given game.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to check.
        y - Position of x axis to check.
        number - Number to check.
        Returns:
        True if number is candidate on x axis, false otherwise.

      • isPossibleY

        private boolean isPossibleY(int[][] game,
                  int x,
                  int number)
        Returns whether given number is candidate on y axis for given game.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to check.
        x - Position of y axis to check.
        number - Number to check.
        Returns:
        True if number is candidate on y axis, false otherwise.

      • isPossibleBlock

        private boolean isPossibleBlock(int[][] game,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int number)
        Returns whether given number is candidate in block for given game.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to check.
        x - Position of number on x axis in game to check.
        y - Position of number on y axis in game to check.
        number - Number to check.
        Returns:
        True if number is candidate in block, false otherwise.

      • getNextPossibleNumber

        private int getNextPossibleNumber(int[][] game,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> numbers)
        Returns next posible number from list for given position or -1 when list is empty.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to check.
        x - X position in game.
        y - Y position in game.
        numbers - List of remaining numbers.
        Returns:
        Next possible number for position in game or -1 when list is empty.

      • generateSolution

        private int[][] generateSolution(int[][] game,
                       int index)
        Generates Sudoku game solution.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to fill, user should pass 'new int[9][9]'.
        index - Current index, user should pass 0.
        Returns:
        Sudoku game solution.

      • generateGame

        private int[][] generateGame(int[][] game)
        Generates Sudoku game from solution.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to be generated, user should pass a solution.
        Returns:
        Generated Sudoku game.

      • generateGame

        private int[][] generateGame(int[][] game,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> positions)
        Generates Sudoku game from solution, user should use the other generateGame method. This method simple removes a number at a position. If the game isn't anymore valid after this action, the game will be brought back to previous state.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to be generated.
        positions - List of remaining positions to clear.
        Returns:
        Generated Sudoku game.

      • isValid

        private boolean isValid(int[][] game)
        Checks whether given game is valid.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to check.
        Returns:
        True if game is valid, false otherwise.

      • isValid

        private boolean isValid(int[][] game,
              int index,
              int[] numberOfSolutions)
        Checks whether given game is valid, user should use the other isValid method. There may only be one solution.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to check.
        index - Current index to check.
        numberOfSolutions - Number of found solutions. Int[] instead of int because of pass by reference.
        Returns:
        True if game is valid, false otherwise.

      • copy

        private int[][] copy(int[][] game)
        Copies a game.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to be copied.
        Returns:
        Copy of given game.
